examples: The apartment is parqueted throughout except for the kitchen and bathroom.

definitions.definition: During an entire period of time, the whole time .
examples: The fight was excrutiating. Throughout , we maintained our dignity though.

definitions.definition: Of an ordinary such as a pile or chevron , or a partition per chevron, etc: extending to the edge of the field (or quarter , chief , etc).

secondary_definitions: During an entire period of time, the whole time .
( heraldry ) Of an ordinary such as a pile or chevron , or a partition per chevron, etc: extending to the edge of the field (or quarter , chief , etc).
